overview:
Tim Tsao is the Portfolio Manager of IBM’s offerings for the midmarket customer segment. Offerings include software, hardware, services, and financing.

Prior to returning to IBM, Tsao was the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Kahiki, Inc., a mid-size food manufacturer based in Columbus, Ohio. During his tenure, he took the company private by selling the company to private equity, established defensible revenue streams, and tripled sales.

Before that, Tsao was at IBM where he held multiple roles, including Worldwide marketing & strategy to Geography demand programs & sales execution.

He now resides in Armonk, New York.
